author: wmtan
body: In preparation for removing framework support for deprecated auto_ptr arguments in put() calls, this pull request replaces the use of auto_ptr with unique_ptr in RecoLocalCalo packages. Also, std::make_unique is used when appropriate. Also, there was a case where a reference to an auto_ptr was an input argument to a function, which is a bad practice because it obscures the possible transfer of ownership. In the cases here, ownership was not transferred, so the object itself was passed by reference.
title: Use unique_ptr, not auto_ptr in RecoLocalCalo
